tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers ( 
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  customer_name VARCHAR(50), 
  email VARCHAR(100), 
  age INT, 
  location VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Customers ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name STRING, customer_email STRING, join_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Posts ( post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_content STRING, post_date DATE, customer_id INT REFERENCES Customers(customer_id) )
CREATE TABLE Likes ( like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT REFERENCES Posts(post_id), customer_id INT REFERENCES Customers(customer_id), like_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username STRING,
    email STRING,
    age INT,
    city STRING
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content STRING,
    likes INT,
    date_posted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text STRING,
    date_commented DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), join_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Posts ( post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), text VARCHAR(255), creation_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Likes ( like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT REFERENCES Posts(post_id), user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), like_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Comments ( comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT REFERENCES Posts(post_id), user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), text VARCHAR(255), comment_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Followers ( follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), follower_user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), follow_date DATE )
